Description.Name: Lover Lost By Error.
Description.Details: The day after your eighteenth birthday, your lover died during a contract due to a mistake you made on your first combat mission.

OptionDescription:
During training you became romantically involved with one of the other [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMechWarrior],MechWarriors]] but it turned to grief as a rookie mistake you made caused your lover to die during combat.

After the debriefing of your failure, you decide to take the bandit king's [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralPhoenixHawk],Phoenix Hawk]] and move away from your devastating loss.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorPiloting],Piloting]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
BioDescription: Once a promising ex-slave, your lover who was one of your lancemates who died due to a mistake you made during combat. Unable to deal with the loss, you quit the merc company, took the bandit king's Phoenix Hawk you stole from your former dead master and set off to find a new life to call your own.
